notes: Click on "Your Images" to see your images.
Click on "Backup" to upload your images to our cloud storage. (We provide full privacy and security.)
Click on "Restore" to download your images from our cloud storage and save them in your local drive. (All files are anti-virus checked.)
Click on "Account" to see your account details and to update your privacy and security settings.
Click on "Subscription" to add your email for our newletters.
